# sourceTypes

**Instance Property**

The format of the verifiable clinical record.

## Declaration

```swift
var sourceTypes: [HKVerifiableClinicalRecordSourceType] { get }
```

## Discussion

For a list of valid formats, see [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKVerifiableClinicalRecordSourceType].

## Accessing the Metadata

- **recordTypes**: The type of records that this query returns.
